snippet: Museums expand their reach and try to make their virtual presence a “distinct experience.”
abstract: Museums are expanding their online programming to create distinct experiences independent of visit to institution, as way to extend the life and content of exhibits.
lead_paragraph: Museums expand their reach and try to make their virtual presence a “distinct experience.”

headline.main: If You Can’t Make It to the Lecture
headline.print_headline: If You Can’t Make It to the Lecture
